actions.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-177 to direct EPA to recognize hydropower as a renewable energy source when issuing, implementing, and enforcing any final rule to address carbon dioxide emissions from existing sources under section 111(d) of the Clean Air Act.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-177 to direct EPA to recognize hydropower as a renewable energy source when issuing, implementing, and enforcing any final rule to address carbon dioxide emissions from existing sources under section 111(d) of the Clean Air Act.
